(Simplified: 脍)
Chinese Definition:
Pictophonetic: 會 indicates the sound; ⺼ (meat) conveys the meaning.
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • ⺼ meat, flesh; organic compound
    • 會 [ huì ] to assemble, to meet; meeting; association, group
①細切的肉：膾鯉。膾炙人口(喻詩文或事物受人歡迎，被人傳誦)。
膾炙人口 [ kuài zhì rén kǒu ]: appealing to the masses; universally appreciated (idiom)

膾字的基本解释

膾
kuài
见“脍”。

膾字的汉语字典释义

[①]［kuài］
［《廣韻》古外切，去泰，見。］
“脍1”的繁体字。
(1)细切的鱼肉。
(2)泛指鱼肉。
(3)细切为脍。亦泛指切割。

膾字的康熙字典解释

【未集下】【肉字部】　膾； 康熙笔画：19； 页码：页996第03
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?古外切，音儈。【說文】細切肉也。【玉篇】肉細切者爲膾。【釋名】膾，會也。細切肉令散，分其赤白異切之，已，乃會合和之也。【韻會】肉腥細者爲膾，大者爲軒。【禮·曲禮】膾炙處外。　又【博雅】膾，割也。　又【廣韻】魚膾。【詩·小雅】炰龞膾鯉。　又【韻會】國名。堯欲伐宗膾。宗膾，小蕃國。　【集韻】或从魚。鱠。

脍
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［kuài］
["Guangyun" ancient outside cut, go to Thailand, see you. ]
"脍1" in traditional characters.
(1) Finely sliced fish.
(2) Refers to fish in general.
(3) Finely cut into glutinous rice. Also refers to cutting.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Not set next] [Department of meat characters] 　脍; Kangxi strokes: 19; Page number: Page 996 No. 03
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Zheng Yun]? Ancient outside cut, sound. 【Said the text】Cut the meat finely. [Jade articles] The meat is finely sliced as a glutinous meat. 【Release name】脍，会也。 Finely cut the meat to make loose, divide its red and white into different cuts, already, it is also the harmony and harmony. [Rhyme Club] The fleshy is fine, the big one is Xuan. 【Rite·Music Ceremony】Extinguish the sunburn place.　[Bo Ya] again, cut too.　[Guangyun] Fish meat. 【Poetry·Xiaoya】The scorpion carp.　[Rhyme Club] The name of the country. Yao wants to cut down Zongwan. Zongzhu, a small fan country.　【Jiyun】or Congyu. Scorpion.
